original_text: Try very much to live at peace with other people. Work hard at your own job. We have already told you that you must do these things.
korean_text: 또 너희에게 명한 것 같이 조용히 자기 일을 하고 너희 손으로 일하기를 힘쓰라

sentences.original_text: Try very much to live at peace with other people.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람들과 평화롭게 살도록 매우 노력하십시오.

sentences.original_text: Work hard at your own job.
that you must do these things.
sentences.korean_translation: 여러분이 이러한 것들을 반드시 해야 한다고.
